topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3eec86368722741390000#post_53a3eec86368722741390000
[bq="twistedmetalero"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a3ed976368720d224f0300#post_53a3ed976368720d224f0300


compare to yours my crossover doesnt fuckign worka t all

it would still be glorious.[/bq]
Don't even get me started on how similar a lot of the characters are either;
(Not sure if ponychan allows hotlinking)
!http://applejack.ponychan.net/chan/files/src/134708295795.png!
Alice would spend the entire time with rarity working on doll dresses.  Satori would spend the entire time with fluttershy and their animal friends.  The aki sisters would be working with applejack on her harvest.  Marisa and Rainbow Dash without a doubt would compete. . . Oh god; if Suika and Pinkie partied together it would be party Armageddon.  Twilight and Patchi would spend the entire time trading books. . . God help us all if Flandre and the CMC hung out.
!http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2013/125/5/2/touhorse___neighentei_by_modern_warmare-d64679i.png!
Kaguya and Luna hanging out would be cool; Gilda and Tewi hanging out would be a disaster for our wallets.
